description: A Rust-based, GPU-accelerated, hybrid (online/offline) VST/CLAP plugin framework designed to compete with Waves Audio by leveraging Antigravity AI for adaptive DSP, dynamic UI, and cloud-synced collaboration.

tech_stack.dsp_core: SIMD (std::simd), Faust (for complex filter prototyping), ONNX Runtime (for ML inference)
tech_stack.cloud_platform: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) - Firestore, Cloud Functions, Pub/Sub
tech_stack.testing: nih-plug_vizia, custom unit tests, DAW integration tests

modules.name: Hybrid_Network_Sync
modules.purpose: Cloud-based preset sync, AI model updates, remote collaboration

modules.name: Deployment_Pipeline
modules.purpose: Automated build, test, and release for VST3/CLAP/AAX

overall_goals: Achieve sub-1ms latency for core DSP.
Maintain CPU usage below 0.5% per plugin instance.
Support 4K+ high-DPI scaling with 60FPS UI rendering.
Implement robust online/offline fallback for all features.
Automate cross-platform deployment for VST3, CLAP, and eventually AAX.
initial_setup_instructions: Run `cargo xtask bundle AntigravityHybrid` to create initial plugin binaries.
